errors.error_description: The command to install LobsterPy with the optional featurizer dependency is misspelled as 'featurizers' (plural).
The command to enforce analysis of all bonds, `lobsterpy automatic-plot --analyse-all-bonds`, uses a non-existent flag.
correction_candidates: You can enforce an analysis of all bonds by using ``lobsterpy automatic-plot --all-bonds``.
You can enforce an analysis of all bonds by using ``lobsterpy automatic-plot --bonds all``.
You can enforce an analysis of all bonds by using ``lobsterpy automatic-plot -a``.
You can enforce an analysis of all bonds by using ``lobsterpy automatic-plot --allbonds``.
errors.golden_answer: You can enforce an analysis of all bonds by using ``lobsterpy automatic-plot --allbonds``.
